attributes.action: Ending Decrimination In The Uk Visa System For Uk  Citizens
attributes.additional_details:
Re The Ending Of Total Out Right Decrimination In  The Present Uk Visa System Thats Infringes The Human Rights Of British Subjects  On Getting Visa,s  From Stopping People On Low Incomes  Or Those Less Fortunately Out Of Work  From Getting  Uk Visa,s   By Stopping Them Because They Have Fell On Hard Time Because Of no Fault Of Theres The States Failing Is Barring These   People We All Have A Right To Love Happiness  Being Together
With The Persuit Of Happiness For All Of Us By Ending This Long Time Decrimination In The Uk Visa,s System
But By Giving Us A Fairer Equality In The Visa ystem For All Uk Citizens
A  Total Change Is Needed In The Law By Ending Total Decrimination in the 21st Century By Moving Forwards  By Making A Equal visa system for all uk ls
Needed  For Uk  Citizens  A  Restructuring Of The Visa systems Must be Made Fairer For Us All Give Us Our Human  Rights Too For Us All In The Uk
